Welcome to Data Mining Class!

Aug 21, 2020

Welcome to class!

The focus of this class will be learning the technical skills for data mining. These skills are generic and can be applied in a wide variety of industries such as business, medicine, manufacturing, service and manufacturing. Additionally, it is also applied across functions such as marketing, finance, human resources and the like.
